event.title: 2007 was about 10,060 persons (the total for the territoire is said

data.event: According to local Ministry of Health officials, the population of the town in 2007 was about 10,060 persons (the total for the territoire is said to be 71,040).
The settlement consists of a few score stuccoed brick buildings, many of them left over from the now defunct cotton plantations of the area.
